Tour Guide
Place to drink Place to eat Place to visit Place to stay
Click here for details image of place from list image of place on details view button for opening the map
//Strings for food places Zone Cafe Strada Uranus 29, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/cD9Y8GwxTw82 Cozy place with coffee, food and drinks. Good place to watch sports.
Pizza Napoleon Aleea Studenților 5, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/VVvM7QWNP8x Pizza, burgers, pasta, shoarma, soups and more. In student\'s area
Oxford Strada Daliei 4, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/M91UYevQFoQ2 Restaurant and Pub with British and international menu. Good place to watch sports.
Helios Sport Club Bulevardul Doctor Iosif Bulbuca, Timișoara 300736 https://goo.gl/maps/VjAQHiCGgZ32 Sport club with restaurant, international menu
Neața Omelette Bistro Strada Vasile Alecsandri 2, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/G4t6g6Gacip Great place for healthy breakfast and coffee
Biofresh 2, Strada Francesco Griselini, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/KD28FHMMePx Large selection of vegan meals
Radha Cuisine Strada Emanoil Ungureanu 13, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/W5sU879cbbr Great Indian food, all vegan.
Oro Toro 5, Municipiul, Timișoara 300254 hhttps://goo.gl/maps/fWWLsZsCLgN2 Great burgers and snack\'s
//Strings for drink places
The 80\'s pub Strada Arieș 19, Timișoara 300736a https://goo.gl/maps/f5fryPiTB3J2 student\'s pub
No Name Bulevardul Doctor Iosif Bulbuca, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/tTvYsLbMZ9m Live music and pool party
Cuib d\'Arte Strada Mărășești 14, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/ifv4jjmpL5A2 Club looking like private flat party
D\'arc pe Mal Bd. Mihai Viteazu, Timisoara, Timis, 300223, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/Z1SmDhFa3d82 Pub and party on a ship
Fratelli Lounge and Club Bulevardul Corneliu Coposu 1, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/6ZE2hjk1vGL2 Luxury club by the river
Strada Lucian Blaga 3, Timișoara Strada Lucian Blaga 3, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/gkMsaAWZSWQ2 Nice cocktail bar
Epic Society Strada Miresei 1, Timișoara 300642 https://goo.gl/maps/opzNnat5uTH2 Luxury club
The Drunken Rat Pub Strada George Coșbuc 1, Timișoara 300048 https://goo.gl/maps/mj53RnfiGmx Nice pub at main square
//Strings for visit places
Liberty\'s Square Piața Libertății, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/c2AzDdE5EiD2 Liberty Square was first called "Square Parade" and "Square Prince Eugen". The name Liberty Square was given in the year 1848 with the Hungarian revolution. After the conquering of Timisoara by the Austrian army, the square changes name to "Prince Eugen Square".
Piața Unirii Bulevardul Doctor Iosif Bulbuca, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/tTvYsLbMZ9m Main city square
Piaţa Victoriei Piața Victoriei, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/qBFsFY4edq52 Victory Square is one of the three big market in Timisoara. There is also a statue of the she-wolf suckled Romulus and Remus, and that\'s a tribute to the Italian Government Romania. Market adorns many palaces from the 18th and 19th centuries.
Roses Park Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/RgfMguHvo5v Beautiful park with roses
Complexul Studențesc Bulevardul Corneliu Coposu 1, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/m52UEJ41ja62 Student\'s area, many restaurant\'s
Strandul Sun Beach Calea Buziașului 9E, Timișoara 300714 https://goo.gl/maps/gkMsaAWZSWQ2 Great pool with bar and live music
Iulius Mall Strada Aristide Demetriade 1, Timișoara 300088 https://goo.gl/maps/HRyzKGiKFfM2 Biggest mall in city
Parcul Copiilor Ion Creangă Bulevardul Constantin Diaconovici Loga 43, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/1Khi72bTQnB2 Big park for kids
//Strings for stay places Hotel Continental Bulevardul Revoluției din 1989, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/LdpMaTJMh5q North Star Continental Resort.
Hostel Costel Strada Petru Sfetca 1, Timișoara 300093 https://goo.gl/maps/VVvM7QWNP8x Hostel
Lido Hotel Bulevardul Doctor Iosif Bulbuca 20, Timișoara https://goo.gl/maps/BiuKJ88RvGB2 Lido Hotel
Hotel Boavista Aleea F. C. Ripensia 7/A, Timișoara 300575 https://goo.gl/maps/MZxb4UonsRy Hotel Boavista
Hotel Timisoara Strada Mărășești 1, Timișoara 300086 https://goo.gl/maps/6ZE2hjk1vGL2 Hotel Timisoara
Hotel Exclusiv Strada Salcâmilor 32, Timișoara 300425 https://goo.gl/maps/xyvQ5KoDYZM2 Hotel Exclusiv
